attributes.action: commercialise bbc and scrap license fee
attributes.additional_details: We the undersigned, believe it is time to make the BBC responsible for It's own survival. Not to be forcibly funded by the brittish public. If the BBC cannot maintain a standard of service to make people willingly pay, then it should be liquidated. The same as any other failed business. It is grossly unfair to make people pay for a product they do not want. In the event of the BBC's failure, all assets should be returned to the public purse and used to effect tax cuts on things that are essential. Such as fuel.
